animeTitle: Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai.
animeDescription: An anime adaptation of the Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai. manga screened at the Ribon Festa 2015 event.  A girl named Mikiko sees the face of a popular boy in her class as a cat's face.
animeRelated: ['Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai.', 'Nekota no Koto ga Kininatte Shikatanai. (ONA)']
